AddOnStorageValue.Name: CS-Cart_Remote Code Execution
AddOnStorageValue.Value: { "Id": "8d4eef5e-b6dc-4e40-9047-6d3ee834b60a", "Application": "CS-Cart", "AffectedVersions": [ "<=4.6.2" ], "VulnerabilityName": "Remote Code Execution", "ExternalReferer": "CVE-2017-15673", "Impact": "High", "Note": "The files function in the administration section in CS-Cart 4.6.2 and earlier allows attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via vectors involving a custom page." }
